channel.title: Two Click Error?
channel.description:
Everytime I open up (you guessed it) bomb's cheat client and i go to use it on a server i click 2 times and i get this. Im not very good with editing things in run.bat or id fix it myself and I need your guys help to fix it.[code]
Bomb's Cheat Client Version 1.0 [Server] IP Changed to: projectlanscape.zapto.org [DEBUG] K = 0 [DEBUG] Check 2 - Abnormal [DEBUG] Check 3 - Abnormal [DEBUG] Check 4 - Abnormal [DEBUG] Check 5 - Abnormal [DEBUG] K = 2 Error: Packet lost, connection broken. Frame = 81 [DEBUG] K = 0 [DEBUG] Check 2 - Abnormal [DEBUG] Check 3 - Abnormal [DEBUG] Check 4 - Abnormal [DEBUG] Check 5 - Abnormal [DEBUG] K = 2 ----------------------------- OutPacket 121 Loading new areas ----------------------------- ----------------------------- OutPacket 130 Trade Window clicking ----------------------------- ----------------------------- OutPacket 164 Main Screen Walking Number of Steps: 1 ----------------------------- ----------------------------- OutPacket 164 Main Screen Walking Number of Steps: 1 ----------------------------- # # A fatal error has been detected by the Java Runtime Environment: # # EXCEPTION_ACCESS_VIOLATION (0xc0000005) at pc=0x000000006d847786, pid=19012, tid=19976 # # JRE version: 6.0_21-b06 # Java VM: Java HotSpot(TM) 64-Bit Server VM (17.0-b16 mixed mode windows-amd64 ) # Problematic frame: # V [jvm.dll+0x57786] # # An error report file with more information is saved as: # C:\Users\Mary\Desktop\Bombs Cheat Client\hs_err_pid19012.log # # If you would like to submit a bug report, please visit: # http://java.sun.com/webapps/bugreport/crash.jsp # Press any key to continue . . . [/code]sorry its so long. Operating System Info: System: Windows Vista x64 Java: Latest Java Verison

item.title: Two Click Error?
item.dc:creator: @badboy1871 badboy1871
item.description:
@badboy1871 wrote:

[quote=“Pure str433, post:2, topic:355292”]Bomb’s cheat client? Lol

Change “Java” in your Run.bat to the following (or similar filepath)

"C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre6\bin\java.exe"

This dont work because when u open the default run.bat it shows this…

@echo off java -Xmx512m -jar Release.jar pause

Read full topic
